synapse
=======
Distributed Key-Value Hypergraph Analysis Framework

Builds
------

- Drone |drone|_
- AppVeyor |appveyor|_
- Codecov |codecov|_
- Documentation |rtd_latest|

Documentation
-------------

https://vertexprojectsynapse.readthedocs.io

~~~~~~~~~~~
